content.query:
drop VIEW odsdate
CREATE VIEW odsdate as
SELECT * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'workspace/ods/date.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'dwh',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) as K

drop VIEW odsCountry
CREATE VIEW odsCountry as
SELECT * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK '/workspace/ods/country.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'dwh',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) as K

drop VIEW odsPolicy;
CREATE VIEW odsPolicy as
SELECT * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK '/workspace/ods/policy/policy20211231.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'dwh',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) as K;

drop VIEW odsCaseMetrics
CREATE VIEW odsCaseMetrics as
SELECT * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK '/workspace/ods/CaseMetrics/CaseMetrics2022-02-12.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'dwh',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) as K

-----################################################################################################-----
drop VIEW vwCovidCasesAvg
CREATE VIEW vwCovidCasesAvg as
Select cm.DateKey , cm.CountryKey
    ,Confirmed	,Confirmed_Change
    ,avg(Confirmed_Change) OVER(partition by cm.CountryKey ORDER BY cm.DateKey ROWS BETWEEN 29 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW ) D30avgConfirmed	
    ,Deaths	,Deaths_Change	
    ,avg(Deaths_Change) OVER(partition by cm.CountryKey ORDER BY cm.DateKey ROWS BETWEEN 29 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW ) D30avgDeaths	
    ,Recovered	,Recovered_Change
    ,avg(Recovered_Change) OVER(partition by cm.CountryKey ORDER BY cm.DateKey ROWS BETWEEN 29 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW ) D30avgRecovered
    ,	C1_Schoolclosing
,	C1_Flag_Schoolclosing
,	C2_Flag_Workplaceclosing
,	C3_Flag_Cancelpublicevents
,	C4_Flag_Restrictionsongatherings
,	C5_Flag_Closepublictransport
,	C6_Flag_Stayathomerequirements
,	C7_Flag_Restrictionsoninternalmovement
,	C8_Internationaltravelcontrols
,	E1_Flag_Incomesupport
,	E2_Debtcontractrelief
,	E3_Fiscalmeasures
,	E4_Internationalsupport
,	H1_Flag_Publicinformationcampaigns
,	H2_Testingpolicy
,	H3_Contacttracing
,	H4_Emergencyinvestmentinhealthcare
,	H5_Investmentinvaccines
,	H6_Flag_FacialCoverings
,	H7_Flag_Vaccinationpolicy
,	H8_Flag_Protectionofelderlypeople
,	M1_Wildcard
,	StringencyIndexForDisplay
,	StringencyLegacyIndex
,	StringencyLegacyIndexForDisplay
,	GovernmentResponseIndex
,	GovernmentResponseIndexForDisplay
,	ContainmentHealthIndex
,	ContainmentHealthIndexForDisplay
,	EconomicSupportIndex
,	EconomicSupportIndexForDisplay
,	StringencyIndex		
from odsCaseMetrics CM
join odsPolicy p on cm.DateKey=p.DateKey and cm.CountryKey=p.CountryKey

Create view vwCovidCases as
select * 
    , iif ((LAG(D30avgConfirmed, 1, 0) OVER (partition by CountryKey ORDER BY Datekey)) = 0, 0,  
    (((D30avgConfirmed - LAG(D30avgConfirmed, 1, 0) OVER (partition by CountryKey ORDER BY Datekey)) * 100.0) / (LAG(D30avgConfirmed, 1, 0) OVER (partition by CountryKey ORDER BY Datekey))) ) PctChgConfirmed
    , iif ((LAG(D30avgDeaths, 1, 0) OVER (partition by CountryKey ORDER BY Datekey)) = 0, 0,  
    (((D30avgDeaths - LAG(D30avgDeaths, 1, 0) OVER (partition by CountryKey ORDER BY Datekey)) * 100.0) / (LAG(D30avgDeaths, 1, 0) OVER (partition by CountryKey ORDER BY Datekey))) ) PctChgDeaths
    , iif ((LAG(D30avgRecovered, 1, 0) OVER (partition by CountryKey ORDER BY Datekey)) = 0, 0,  
    (((D30avgRecovered - LAG(D30avgRecovered, 1, 0) OVER (partition by CountryKey ORDER BY Datekey)) * 100.0) / (LAG(D30avgRecovered, 1, 0) OVER (partition by CountryKey ORDER BY Datekey))) ) PctChgRecovered
from  vwCovidCasesavg

select * from vwCovidCases
/*
select CountryKey ,Datekey, Confirmed_Change, D30avgConfirmed
    ,LAG(D30avgConfirmed, 1, 0) OVER (partition by CountryKey ORDER BY Datekey) as previousD30avgConfirmed
    , iif ((LAG(D30avgConfirmed, 1, 0) OVER (partition by CountryKey ORDER BY Datekey)) = 0, 0,  
    (((D30avgConfirmed - LAG(D30avgConfirmed, 1, 0) OVER (partition by CountryKey ORDER BY Datekey)) * 100.0) / (LAG(D30avgConfirmed, 1, 0) OVER (partition by CountryKey ORDER BY Datekey))) ) PectChgConfirmed
from vwCovidCasesavg
--where CountryKey=61 --and Datekey between 20200229 and 20200310
order by Datekey
*/
